title: 354 - Still Can’t Find Your Style? Do These 3 Simple Yet Powerful Steps
description:
__________

Listen and Subscribe on Apple, Spotify and more: https://link.chtbl.com/creativepeptalk

Transcripts available at https://creativepeptalk.com/episodes

__________

SHOW NOTES

Creative Zero-To-Hero Series
1. Skill
2. Story
3. Style
4. Setting
5. Psychology
6. Say Something

“To be an artist is to believe in life.” - Henry Moore

Malcolm Gladwell’s “Talking To Strangers” Book
https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/43848929-talking-to-strangers

Schoolhouse Rock! “Unpack Your Adjectives” Song
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HpPEQZl6_d4

__________

SPONSORS

STORYBLOCKS
Video is one of my most effective ways to stand out as a creator online these days - and with Storyblocks you can take your videos to the next level - with Affordable Subscriptions, Unlimited Downloads, and 1M+ Royalty Free Assets - you can level up your content at storyblocks.com/CreativePepTalk

SHILLINGTON 
Study graphic design with Shillington for 3 months full-time or 9 months part-time. With Shillington’s graphic design course, you’ll graduate with a solid understanding of creative problem solving, design theory and software. Create an incredible design portfolio and master how to discuss and sell your work—essential skills for any creative career. LEARN MORE: https://shillo.design/pep

TALK EASY / PUSHKIN
I want to tell you about another podcast you'll love, Talk Easy with Sam Fragoso.
Talk Easy is a different kind of weekly interview show. Sam offers a space for guests to slow down and share how they arrived at the place they are today and where they hope to go tomorrow.
Rigorously researched and irrepressibly curious, Talk Easy invites artists, writers, and activists to come to the table and speak from the heart in ways you probably haven't heard from them before.
Some of my favorite interviews include talks with Jeff Garlin, Lorde, Nick Offerman, Janelle Monáe, and George Saunders. This season, Sam will sit with folks like Questlove, Alana Haim, Cate Blanchett, Margaret Atwood and more.
Listen to new episodes of Talk Easy with Sam Fragoso, every Sunday: https://talkeasypod.com
author: andy@andy-j-miller.com (Co-Loop Podcast Network)

itunes:title: 354 - Still Can’t Find Your Style? Do These 3 Simple Yet Powerful Steps
itunes:author: Co-Loop Podcast Network
itunes:summary:
Do you ever fully “find your style” for good? I don’t think so. It’s a living document.  I’ve done episodes on the topic. Taught whole classes on it. But, I’ve stayed on the hunt for over a decade, and I still have breakthroughs that surprise me. 

In this episode, I want to share some new thoughts on how to think about finding your style that really unlocked stuff for me and give you some exercises that I hope unlock something for you TODAY!
itunes:subtitle:

In this episode, I want to share some new thoughts on how to think about finding your style that really unlocked stuff for me and give you some exercises that I hope unlock something for you TODAY!
